pageContext.claim: “I've told them to work with local authorities to try to change the terrible deal the city of Chicago entered into with ACLU, which ties law enforcement's hands; and to strongly consider stop-and-frisk.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump, like Attorney General Jeff Sessions, blames an ACLU settlement with Chicago that reinforced recordkeeping requirements for a crime wave in 2016. Several studies point to multiple other factors for the crime rise. It should also be noted that Illinois enacted a statute with many of the same provisions as the ACLU settlement around the same time.
